Name: Millet
Substitute: Bulgur

Name: Pearl Barley
Substitute: Quinoa

Name: dry French lentil
Substitute: Red bean

Name: Allspice
Substitute: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ginger, and 1/4 teaspoon cloves

Name: Arrowroot starch
Substitute: 1 tablespoon flour OR 1 teaspoon cornstarch

Name: Baking mix
Substitute: 1 cup pancake mix

Name: Baking powder
Substitute: 1/4 teaspoon baking soda plus 1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar OR 1/4 teaspoon baking soda plus 1/2 cup buttermilk (decrease liquid in recipe by 1/2 cup)

Name: Baking soda
Substitute: 4 teaspoons baking powder OR 1 teaspoon potassium bicarbonate and 1/3 teaspoon salt. NOTE: If the recipe calls for an acidic liquid such as sour cream, yogurt, buttermilk, vinegar, molasses, or citrus juice, you should replace it with the same amount of whole milk

Name: Beer
Substitute: 1 cup nonalcoholic beer OR 1 cup chicken broth

Name: Brandy
Substitute: 1 teaspoon imitation brandy extract plus enough water to make 1/4 cup

Name: Bread crumbs
Substitute: 1 cup cracker crumbs OR 1 cup matzo meal OR 1 cup ground oats

Name: Broth: beef or chicken
Substitute: 1 bouillon cube plus 1 cup boiling water OR 1 tablespoon soy sauce plus enough water to make 1 cup OR 1 cup vegetable broth

Name: Brown sugar
Substitute: 1 cup white sugar plus 1/4 cup molasses and decrease the liquid in recipe by 1/4 cup OR 1 cup white sugar OR 1 1/4 cups confectioners' sugar

Name: Butter (salted)
Substitute: 1 cup margarine OR 1 cup shortening plus 1/2 teaspoon salt OR 7/8 cup vegetable oil plus 1/2 teaspoon salt OR 7/8 cup lard plus 1/2 teaspoon salt

Name: Butter (unsalted)
Substitute: 1 cup shortening OR 7/8 cup vegetable oil OR 7/8 cup lard

Name: Buttermilk
Substitute: 1 cup yogurt OR 1 tablespoon lemon juice or vinegar plus enough milk to make 1 cup

Name: Cheddar cheese
Substitute: 1 cup shredded Colby cheddar OR 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese

Name: Chervil
Substitute: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley

Name: Chicken base
Substitute: 1 cup canned or homemade chicken broth or stock. Reduce liquid in recipe by 1 cup

Name: Chocolate (semisweet)
Substitute: 1 (1-ounce) square of unsweetened chocolate plus 4 teaspoons sugar OR 1 ounce semisweet chocolate chips plus 1 teaspoon shortening

Name: Chocolate (unsweetened)
Substitute: 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa plus 1 tablespoon shortening or vegetable oil

Name: Cocoa
Substitute: 1 (1-ounce) square unsweetened chocolate

Name: Condensed cream of mushroom soup
Substitute: 1 (10.75-ounce) can condensed cream of celery, cream of chicken, or golden mushroom soup

Name: Corn syrup
Substitute: 1 1/4 cup white sugar plus 1/3 cup water OR 1 cup honey OR 1 cup light treacle syrup

Name: Cottage cheese
Substitute: 1 cup farmer's cheese OR 1 cup ricotta cheese

Name: Cracker crumbs
Substitute: 1 cup bread crumbs OR 1 cup matzo meal OR 1 cup ground oats

Name: Cream (half and half)
Substitute: 7/8 cup milk plus 1 tablespoon butter

Name: Cream (heavy)
Substitute: 1 cup evaporated milk OR 3/4 cup milk plus 1/3 cup butter

Name: Cream (light)
Substitute: 1 cup evaporated milk OR 3/4 cup milk plus 3 tablespoons butter

Name: Cream (whipped)
Substitute: 1 cup frozen whipped topping, thawed

Name: Cream of tartar
Substitute: 2 teaspoons lemon juice or vinegar

Name: Crème fraiche
Substitute: Combine 1 cup of heavy cream and 1 tablespoon of plain yogurt. Let stand for 6 hours at room temperature

Name: Egg
Substitute: 2 1/2 tablespoons of powdered egg substitute plus 2 1/2 tablespoons water OR 1/4 cup liquid egg substitute OR 1/4 cup silken tofu pureed OR 3 tablespoons mayonnaise OR half a banana mashed with 1/2 teaspoon baking powder OR 1 tablespoon powdered flax seed soaked in 3 tablespoons water

Name: Evaporated milk
Substitute: 1 cup light cream

Name: Farmer's cheese
Substitute: 8 ounces dry cottage cheese OR 8 ounces creamed cottage cheese, drained

Name: Fats for baking
Substitute: 1 cup applesauce OR 1 cup fruit puree

Name: Flour: bread
Substitute: 1 cup all-purpose flour plus 1 teaspoon wheat gluten

Name: Flour: cake
Substitute: 1 cup all-purpose flour minus 2 tablespoons

Name: Flour: self-Rising
Substitute: 7/8 cup all-purpose flour plus 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder and 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Name: Garlic
Substitute: 1/8 teaspoon garlic powder OR 1/2 teaspoon granulated garlic OR 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt, reduce salt in recipe

Name: Gelatin
Substitute: 2 teaspoons agar agar

Name: Ginger (dry)
Substitute: 2 teaspoons chopped fresh ginger

Name: Ginger (fresh)
Substitute: 1/2 teaspoon ground dried ginger

Name: Green onion
Substitute: 1/2 cup chopped onion OR 1/2 cup chopped leek OR 1/2 cup chopped shallots

Name: Hazelnuts
Substitute: 1 cup macadamia nuts OR 1 cup almonds

Name: Herbs (fresh)
Substitute: 1 teaspoon (chopped or whole leaf) dried herbs

Name: Herring
Substitute: 8 ounces of sardines

Name: Honey
Substitute: 1 1/4 cup white sugar plus 1/3 cup water OR 1 cup corn syrup OR 1 cup light treacle syrup

Name: Hot pepper sauce
Substitute: 3/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper plus 1 teaspoon vinegar

Name: Lard
Substitute: 1 cup shortening OR 7/8 cup vegetable oil OR 1 cup butter

Name: Lemon grass
Substitute: 1 tablespoon lemon zest

Name: Lemon juice
Substitute: 1/2 teaspoon vinegar OR 1 teaspoon white wine OR 1 teaspoon lime juice

Name: Lemon zest
Substitute: 1/2 teaspoon lemon extract OR 2 tablespoons lemon juice

Name: Lime juice
Substitute: 1 teaspoon vinegar OR 1 teaspoon white wine OR 1 teaspoon lemon juice

Name: Lime zest
Substitute: 1 teaspoon lemon zest

Name: Macadamia nuts
Substitute: 1 cup almonds OR 1 cup hazelnuts

Name: Mace
Substitute: 1 teaspoon nutmeg

Name: Margarine
Substitute: 1 cup shortening plus 1/2 teaspoon salt OR 1 cup butter OR 7/8 cup vegetable oil plus 1/2 teaspoon salt OR 7/8 cup lard plus 1/2 teaspoon salt

Name: Mayonnaise
Substitute: 1 cup sour cream OR 1 cup plain yogurt

Name: Milk (whole)
Substitute: 1 cup soy milk OR 1 cup rice milk OR 1 cup water or juice OR 1/4 cup dry milk powder plus 1 cup water OR 2/3 cup evaporated milk plus 1/3 cup water

Name: Mint (fresh)
Substitute: 1 tablespoon dried mint leaves

Name: Molasses
Substitute: Mix 3/4 cup brown sugar and 1 teaspoon cream of tartar

Name: Mustard: prepared
Substitute: Mix together 1 tablespoon dried mustard, 1 teaspoon water, 1 teaspoon vinegar and 1 teaspoon sugar

Name: Onion
Substitute: 1 cup chopped green onions OR 1 cup chopped shallots OR 1 cup chopped leeks OR 1/4 cup dried minced onion OR 1/4 cup onion powder

Name: Orange juice
Substitute: 1 tablespoon other citrus juice

Name: Orange zest
Substitute: 1/2 teaspoon orange extract OR 1 teaspoon lemon juice

Name: Parmesan cheese
Substitute: 1/2 cup grated Asiago cheese OR 1/2 cup grated Romano cheese

Name: Parsley
Substitute: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chervil OR 1 teaspoon dried parsley

Name: Pepperoni
Substitute: 1 ounce salami

Name: Raisin
Substitute: 1 cup dried currants OR 1 cup dried cranberries OR 1 cup chopped pitted prunes

Name: Rice: white
Substitute: 1 cup cooked barley OR 1 cup cooked bulgur OR 1 cup cooked brown or wild rice

Name: Ricotta
Substitute: 1 cup dry cottage cheese OR 1 cup silken tofu

Name: Rum
Substitute: 1/2 teaspoon rum extract, plus enough water to make 1 tablespoon

Name: Saffron
Substitute: 1/4 teaspoon turmeric

Name: Salami
Substitute: 1 ounce pepperoni

Name: Semisweet chocolate chips
Substitute: 1 cup chocolate candies OR 1 cup peanut butter or other flavored chips OR 1 cup chopped nuts OR 1 cup chopped dried fruit

Name: Shallots, chopped
Substitute: 1/2 cup chopped onion OR 1/2 cup chopped leek OR 1/2 cup chopped green onion

Name: Shortening
Substitute: 1 cup butter OR 1 cup margarine minus 1/2 teaspoon salt from recipe

Name: Sour cream
Substitute: 1 cup plain yogurt OR 1 tablespoon lemon juice or vinegar plus enough cream to make 1 cup OR 3/4 cup buttermilk mixed with 1/3 cup butter

Name: Sour milk
Substitute: 1 tablespoon vinegar or lemon juice mixed with enough milk to make 1 cup: Let stand 5 minutes to thicken

Name: Soy sauce
Substitute: 1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce mixed with 1 tablespoon water

Name: Stock: beef or chicken
Substitute: 1 cube beef or chicken bouillon dissolved in 1 cup water

Name: Sweetened condensed milk
Substitute: 3/4 cup white sugar mixed with 1/2 cup water and 1 1/8 cups dry powdered milk: Bring to a boil and cook, stirring frequently, until thickened, about 20 minutes

Name: Vegetable oil (for baking)
Substitute: 1 cup applesauce OR 1 cup fruit puree

Name: Vegetable oil (for frying)
Substitute: 1 cup lard OR 1 cup vegetable shortening

Name: Vinegar
Substitute: 1 teaspoon lemon or lime juice OR 2 teaspoons white wine

Name: White sugar
Substitute: 1 cup brown sugar OR 1 1/4 cups confectioners' sugar OR 3/4 cup honey OR 3/4 cup corn syrup

Name: Wine
Substitute: 1 cup chicken or beef broth OR 1 cup fruit juice mixed with 2 teaspoons vinegar OR 1 cup water

Name: Yeast: active dry
Substitute: 1 cake compressed yeast OR 2 1/2 teaspoons active dry yeast OR 2 1/2 teaspoons rapid rise yeast

Name: Yogurt
Substitute: 1 cup sour cream OR 1 cup buttermilk OR 1 cup sour milk
